summary: An ordinance authorizing an agreement with the State of Washington for the removal, relocation or construction of certain traffic devices and inspection of certain utility facilities by the City and State, incident to the construction of the Roanoke Connection from East Roanoke Street to Montlake Boulevard East and providing for reimbursement to the City for the cost of its work in connection therewith.
committee: Finance and City Utilities and Streets & Sewers
